promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic basic monkey normal-type holding a opal whip. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opaline, a gigantic basic monkey normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: tackle, happy-hour. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word monkey or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, monkey-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: Opaline is a gentle giant. It loves searching the grasslands for new friends, greeting them with its signature Tackle and Happy-Hour.
